description: This fresh cheese made from strained yoghurt is served as a mezze dish in the Middle East. It is good with herbs or spices sprinkled over and served with toasted flatbreads.
keywords: Dip & spread,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Labna Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir the yoghurt and salt together until evenly combined. Spoon onto a large square of muslin, then gather together the four corners and tie the top of the bundle with string, to make a bag.
Suspend the bag over a bowl and leave for at least 12 hours for the whey to drip through.
Remove the strained yoghurt from the muslin, shape into a ball, and serve.
